## Public Member Functions

### print() {#a98699cc72f471186c098ae5443e3f271}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LinkDiagnosticInfo::print (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticprinter">DiagnosticPrinter</a> &amp; DP) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Print using the given <code>DP</code> a user-friendly message.

This is the default message that will be printed to the user. It is used when the frontend does not directly take advantage of the information contained in fields of the subclasses. The printed message must not end with &#39;.&#39; nor start with a severity keyword.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/linkdiagnosticinfo-h/#l00020">20</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/linkdiagnosticinfo-h">LinkDiagnosticInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/irmover-cpp/#l00345">345</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/irmover-cpp">IRMover.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
